content.rendered:
VAR AUTOMOTIVE CONTACT INFORMATION

NARRABEEN

1430 Pittwater Rd, Narrabeen NSW 2101

(02) 9337 1136

service@varautomotive.com.au

Monday – Friday 7:30am to 5:30pm

 

VAUCLUSE

77-79 New South Head Rd, Vaucluse NSW 2030

(02) 9337 1136

service@varautomotive.com.au

Monday – Friday 8am to 5:30pm

 

GIVE US A CALL GIVE US A CALL
BOOK A SERVICE BOOK A SERVICE
OPERATING SINCE 1990

We pride ourselves on serving the local community and beyond for 30 years and counting.

EXPERT TECHNICIANS

We employ only exert technicians, so you can rest assured that your vehicle's repairs are carried out to manufacturer's specs.

PICK UP & DROP OFF

To help you get from A to B, we also offer a complimentary loan car when possible, and a pickup and drop off service in the local area.

QUALITY CUSTOMER SERVICE

We keep you informed throughout the repair process of your vehicle with courtesy calls and pricing transparency.

Our Team

Our team is led by Michael, the founder of Vaucluse Auto Repairs, who has more than 40 years of experience in the automotive industry.

Here at Vaucluse Auto Repairs we are all car lovers and enthusiasts. We take technical skills development and training seriously, providing the opportunity for our team to grow their skills and knowledge to insure up to date competency in the industry.

Specialising in European and prestige vehicles, our fully qualified technicians are ready to perform high-quality vehicle inspections, servicing, repairs and diagnosis using state-of-the-art diagnostic tools and repair equipment.

We believe, what makes us different is our old-fashioned customer service, quality of repairs and pride in our work.

Over the years we have built a reliable and trusted network of automotive specialists, this means that we can help with any and all of your automotive needs.

BOOK A SERVICE BOOK A SERVICE

CONNECT WITH US

Instagram Facebook Linkedin

RELATED SERVICES
